answers.answer: I'm 32 almost 33wks w my second and I'm on metformin for mine.. my Dr thinks il end up on insulin before long :( I Def know how u feel I'm praying mine goes away after I have my son
Sorry there it it lol it wasn't showing

What's your A1c? I failed my 1 hour at 20 weeks and my 3 hour at 22. I tried to manage with diet but it didn't work. I'm 32 weeks now and have been on insulin since 30 weeks but my A1c is in range for a normal non diabetic person. I was never offered pills but my doctor mentioned that maintaining a normal A1c will help ensure the diabetes goes away after birth.

question: Hey ladies I'm 28wks pregnant with my secod baby... but a week ago they found out my blood sugar is a lil bit high and now I'm on pills for it.. I'm scared for it to stay after a have my baby I really don't want that.... does anyone of yall going thru the same thing?
title: I'm a lil bit scared!
